<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Desiring <S%G2309><s%> To Justify <S%G1344><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Neighbour? <S%G4139><s%>
